io.basic.ddf.content

Class PersistenceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.ddf.misc.ALoggable
      • io.ddf.misc.ADDFFunctionalGroupHandler
        • io.ddf.content.APersistenceHandler
          • io.basic.ddf.content.PersistenceHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHandlePersistence, IHandleDDFFunctionalGroup, ISupportPhantomReference

    public class PersistenceHandler
extends APersistenceHandler
    This PersistenceHandler loads and saves from/to a designated storage area.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PersistenceHandler.BasicPersistible
      Base class for objects that can persist themselves (e.g, Models) via the BasicObjectDDF persistence mechanism

      Like PersistenceUri but also with namespace and name parsed

      • persist

        public APersistenceHandler.PersistenceUri persist(boolean doOverwrite)
                                           throws DDFException
        Description copied from interface: IHandlePersistence
        Saves the current DDF to our default persistent storage, at minimum by namespace and name, together with the DDF's metadata, and in whatever serialized format that can be read back in later.
        Parameters:
        doOverwrite - overwrites if true
        Returns:
        PersistenceUri of persisted location
        Throws:
        DDFException - if doOverwrite is false and the destination already exists

      • unpersist

        public void unpersist(String namespace,
             String name)
               throws DDFException
        Description copied from interface: IHandlePersistence
        Deletes the identified DDF "file" from persistent storage. This does not affect any DDF currently loaded in memory or in processing space.
        Throws:
        DDFException - if specified target does not exist

        Copies the identified DDF "files" from the specified source to destination.
        doOverwrite - overwrites if true
        Throws:

      • load

        public IHandlePersistence.IPersistible load(String uri)
                                     throws DDFException
        Description copied from interface: IHandlePersistence
        Loads DDF from given URI. The URI format should be: 
         ://
        e.g., 
         basic:///root/ddf/ddf-runtime/basic-ddf-db/com.example/MyDDF.dat
        If the engine is not specified, the current DDF's engine is used.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DDFException
